This folder is intended to contain pugixml sources (pugixml.hpp and pugixml.cpp).

Please download the two files from the official repository and place them here:
- https://raw.githubusercontent.com/zeux/pugixml/master/src/pugixml.hpp
- https://raw.githubusercontent.com/zeux/pugixml/master/src/pugixml.cpp

Alternatively, install pugixml via your system package manager and remove these files.
